AboutArray.title: Web Design
AboutArray.text: My time with web design and development started fairly recently but my interest for it goes back to as far as I can recall. My passion for web design stems from my love of art in general and seeing well designed websites is one of my favorite things.

AboutArray.title: Web development
AboutArray.text: Web development is something perfectly crafted or a person like me that is very maticulous and loves a challenge. These aspects are what fuel my passion for coding.

AboutArray.title: UI & UX
AboutArray.text: I believe that paying attention to user interface and user experience is what will make the person viewing your web page have a better experience overall. Tools Ive used to refine the UI/UX of my projects is Figma designing software.

AboutArray.title: Graphic Design
AboutArray.text: My graphic design skills allow me to design websites from an artistic perspective with the goal of a visually satisfying outcome. I'm a very creative individual who has a passion for combining art with technology.

AboutArray.title: 3D printing
AboutArray.text: During a prior course I gained experience with Flashforge 3D printing software and Flashprint Adventurer 3 printers. 3D printing allows me to be creative and solve fun problems along the way.

AboutArray.title: Photography
AboutArray.text: Another creative passion of mine includes photography because I love capturing memories and special moments. Photography and art in general inspires me when I create websites.
